name: test_e2e_with_logs[015_SQLI_ERROR_005]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_ERROR_005` |
| **Name** | Subquery error-based injection |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | error_based |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `' AND (SELECT * FROM users WHERE id=1) --`
- **Encoded**: `'%20AND%20(SELECT%20*%20FROM%20users%20WHERE%20id%3D1)%20--`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~21000ms
- **Timestamp**: 10:41:38.000 UTC

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX SQLi] Error-based SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_ERROR_005-1766313698141-c7fci pattern_id=SQLI_ERROR_005 uri=/?q='%20AND%20(SELECT%20*%20FROM%20users%20WHERE%20id%3D1)%20-- client=127.0.0.1 method=GET

**Falco Log Entry**:
```
10:41:38.000000000: Critical [NGINX SQLi] Error-based SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_ERROR_005-1766313698141-c7fci pattern_id=SQLI_ERROR_005 uri=/?q='%20AND%20(SELECT%20*%20FROM%20users%20WHERE%20id%3D1)%20-- client=127.0.0.1 method=GET
```
